I’m not surprised she draws well. I learned makeup very fast due to my experience with drawing portraits. An artist is always an artist, regardless of the canvas and medium. Art theories apply to makeup, as it does to portraits and landscapes artworks. If you understand how colors and lightning work, you will have a good understanding of the best way to apply makeup in order to create certain looks.
